16 class DFSClass{
23 public:
24  DFSClass(float scan[360], float nextPos[2]);
25  bool handleNode();
27  float *currentPose;
28  int getNodeNumber();
29 
30 private:
31  const float width = 1.25;
32  const float pathWidth = 1.1;
33  const float exitDistance = 2.5;
34  const double closed = 0.8;
35  const double current = 0.8;
36  const double visited = 0.4;
38  struct nodestruct
39  {
40  double x;
41  double y;
42  double dir[5];
43  int move;
44  };
45  vector<nodestruct> graph;
47  struct coordinatesStruct
48  {
49  double x;
50  double y;
51  };
52  vector<coordinatesStruct> visitedVector;
54  // pointer to main
55  float *scanResult;
56  float *nextPosition;
58  // orientation
59  int orientation = 0;
60  float orientedDistances[5] = {0,0,0,0,0};
62  //
63  bool newMovement = true;
64  bool escaped = false;
65 
66  // METHODS
67  void directions();
68  bool checkExit();
69  int getOrientation();
70  void setStatus(vector<nodestruct> &node, double newStatus);
71  void scan(vector<nodestruct> &node);
72  bool checkIfVisited(vector<nodestruct> &node);
73  void correctNodePosition(vector<nodestruct> &node);
74  void printNode(vector<nodestruct> currentNode);
75 
76 };

78 DFSClass::DFSClass(float scan[360], float nextPos[2]): scanResult(scan), nextPosition(nextPos)
79 {
80  graph.push_back(nodestruct());
81  visitedVector.push_back(coordinatesStruct());
82 }

89 int DFSClass::getNodeNumber()
90 {
91  return graph.size();
92 }

99 bool DFSClass::handleNode()
100 {
101  cout << "__________________________________" << endl;
102  cout << "DFS algorithm:" << endl;
103 
104  getOrientation();
105  directions();
106  if(checkExit())
107  {
108  cout << endl;
109  cout << "----------------------------------" << endl;
110  cout << " EXIT FOUND" << endl;
111  cout << "----------------------------------" << endl;
112  cout << endl << endl << "press \"q\" in the main terminal to close" << endl;
113  escaped = true;
114  return true;
115  }
116 
117  // scan if new node is reached
118  if(newMovement)
119  {
120  scan(graph);
121  newMovement = false;
122  setStatus(graph, visited);
123  correctNodePosition(graph);
124  }
125 
126  // set previous direction (necessary for first node)
127  int prevDirection;
128  if(graph.size()<2)
129  prevDirection = 1;
130  else
131  prevDirection = graph[graph.size()-2].move;
132 
133  // deciding next movement (prefered: keep previous direction)
134  for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
135  {
136  if((prevDirection+i)>4)
137  prevDirection -= 4;
138 
139  if(graph[graph.size()-1].dir[(prevDirection+i)] == 0)
140  {
141  graph[graph.size()-1].move = (prevDirection+i);
142  newMovement = true;
143  break;
144  }
145  }
146  if(!newMovement)
147  graph[graph.size()-1].move = 0;
148 
149  // print the current node
150  printNode(graph);
151 
152  //move
153  int motion = graph[graph.size()-1].move;
154  switch(motion)
155  {
156  case 0: // move back
157  cout << " - DEAD END -" << endl;
158  graph.pop_back();
159  setStatus(graph, closed);
160 
161  break;
162  case 1: // move right
163  graph.push_back(nodestruct());
164  graph[graph.size()-1].x = graph[graph.size()-2].x + width;
165  graph[graph.size()-1].y = graph[graph.size()-2].y;
166  newMovement = !checkIfVisited(graph);
167  break;
168  case 2: // move dowm
169  graph.push_back(nodestruct());
170  graph[graph.size()-1].x = graph[graph.size()-2].x;
171  graph[graph.size()-1].y = graph[graph.size()-2].y - width;
172  newMovement = !checkIfVisited(graph);
173  break;
174  case 3: // move left
175  graph.push_back(nodestruct());
176  graph[graph.size()-1].x = graph[graph.size()-2].x - width;
177  graph[graph.size()-1].y = graph[graph.size()-2].y;
178  newMovement = !checkIfVisited(graph);
179  break;
180  case 4: // move up
181  graph.push_back(nodestruct());
182  graph[graph.size()-1].x = graph[graph.size()-2].x;
183  graph[graph.size()-1].y = graph[graph.size()-2].y + width;
184  newMovement = !checkIfVisited(graph);
185  break;
186  }
187 
188  // next node
189  nextPosition[0] = graph[graph.size()-1].x;
190  nextPosition[1] = graph[graph.size()-1].y;
191 
192  return false;
193 }
194 
196 // calculates mean distances to fall for front, right, back, left side of turtle
202 void DFSClass::directions()
203 {
204  float dirDistance[5] = {0,0,0,0,0};
205  int range = 10;
206 
207  for(int j = 0; j < 4; j++)
208  {
209  for(int i = j*90-range; i < j*90+range; i++)
210  {
211  if(i<0)
212  dirDistance[j+1] += scanResult[i+360];
213  else
214  dirDistance[j+1] += scanResult[i];
215  }
216  dirDistance[j+1] = dirDistance[j+1]/(2*range);
217  }
218 
219  for(int i = 1; i < 5; i++)
220  {
221  if( (orientation+(i-1)) > 4 )
222  orientedDistances[orientation+(i-1)-4] = dirDistance[i];
223  else
224  orientedDistances[orientation+(i-1)] = dirDistance[i];
225  }
226 
227 }
228 
234 bool DFSClass::checkExit()
235 {
236  int counter = 0;
237  for(int i = 1; i < 5; i++)
238  {
239  if(orientedDistances[i] > exitDistance)
240  counter ++;
241  }
242 
243  if(counter >= 4)
244  return true;
245 
246  return false;
247 }
248 
249 
251 
254 int DFSClass::getOrientation()
255 {
256  // cout << "orientation difference: " << orientation - initOrientation << endl;
257  // cout << "initial Orientation" << initOrientation << endl;
258  //r, d, l, u
259 
260  int toleranceAngle = 45;
261 
262  if(abs(currentPose[2]) < toleranceAngle)
263  orientation = 1;
264  else if(currentPose[2] < 90+toleranceAngle && currentPose[2] > 90-toleranceAngle)
265  orientation = 4;
266  else if(abs(currentPose[2]) < 180 && abs(currentPose[2]) > 180-toleranceAngle)
267  orientation = 3;
268  else if(currentPose[2] < -90+toleranceAngle && currentPose[2] > -90-toleranceAngle)
269  orientation = 2;
270  else
271  cout << "ERROR at finding orientation" << endl;
272 
273  //cout << "\torientation: " << orientation << endl;
274  return orientation;
275 }
276 
279 void DFSClass::setStatus(vector<nodestruct> &node, double newStatus){
280 
281  int motion = 0;
282 
283  if(newStatus == closed)
284  motion = node[node.size()-1].move;
285  else if(newStatus == visited)
286  motion = node[node.size()-2].move;
287  else
288  cout << "- ERROR: newStatus -" << endl;
289 
290  switch(motion)
291  {
292  case 0:
293  break;
294  case 1:
295  if(newStatus == closed)
296  node[node.size()-1].dir[1] = newStatus;
297  else
298  node[node.size()-1].dir[3] = newStatus;
299  break;
300  case 2:
301  if(newStatus == closed)
302  node[node.size()-1].dir[2] = newStatus;
303  else
304  node[node.size()-1].dir[4] = newStatus;
305  break;
306  case 3:
307  if(newStatus == closed)
308  node[node.size()-1].dir[3] = newStatus;
309  else
310  node[node.size()-1].dir[1] = newStatus;
311  break;
312  case 4:
313  if(newStatus == closed)
314  node[node.size()-1].dir[4] = newStatus;
315  else
316  node[node.size()-1].dir[2] = newStatus;
317  break;
318  }
319 
320 }
321 
325 void DFSClass::scan(vector<nodestruct> &node)
326 {
327  for(int i = 1; i < 5; i++)
328  {
329  if(orientedDistances[i] > pathWidth)
330  node[node.size()-1].dir[i] = 0;
331  else
332  node[node.size()-1].dir[i] = 1;
333  }
334 
335  node[node.size()-1].x = currentPose[0];
336  node[node.size()-1].y = currentPose[1];
337 }
338 
342 bool DFSClass::checkIfVisited(vector<nodestruct> &node)
343 {
344  coordinatesStruct currentPos = {node[node.size()-1].x, node[node.size()-1].y};
345 
346  for(int i = 0; i < (visitedVector.size()-1); i++){
347  if(visitedVector[i].x == node[node.size()-1].x && visitedVector[i].y == node[node.size()-1].y)
348  {
349  cout << " - VISITED BEFORE -" << endl;
350  //visumaze.at<double>(NV[NV.size()-1].y,NV[NV.size()-1].x) = 0.1;
351  node.pop_back();
352  //nodelist.pop_back();
353  setStatus(node, closed);
354  return 1;
355  }
356  }
357  visitedVector.push_back(currentPos);
358  return 0;
359 }
360 
364 void DFSClass::correctNodePosition(vector<nodestruct> &node)
365 {
366  float minimumPosition[2] = {-5.625, -5.625};
367 
368  for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++){
369  if(abs(node[node.size()-1].x-(minimumPosition[0]+width*i)) < 0.2)
370  {
371  node[node.size()-1].x = (minimumPosition[0]+width*i);
372  }
373  if(abs(node[node.size()-1].y-(minimumPosition[1]+width*i)) < 0.2)
374  {
375  node[node.size()-1].y = (minimumPosition[1]+width*i);
376  }
377  }
378 }
379 
383 void DFSClass::printNode(vector<nodestruct> currentNode)
384 {
385  cout << " node: " << currentNode.size();
386  cout << " pos: (" << currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].x;
387  cout << ", " << currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].y;
388  cout << ")\tr: " << currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].dir[1] <<
389  "\td: " << currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].dir[2] <<
390  "\tl: " << currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].dir[3] <<
391  "\tu: " << currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].dir[4] <<
392  "\tmove: ";
393  //dead end, r, d, l, u
394  switch(currentNode[currentNode.size()-1].move){
395  case 0:
396  cout << "back" << endl;
397  break;
398  case 1:
399  cout << "r" << endl;
400  break;
401  case 2:
402  cout << "d" << endl;
403  break;
404  case 3:
405  cout << "l" << endl;
406  break;
407  case 4:
408  cout << "u" << endl;
409  break;
410  default:
411  cout << endl;
412  break;
413  }
414 }
